ygData.subject: Re: On a note of mistakes...
ygData.msgSnippet: Anytime a mob is hit (maybe just by magic) it has chance to break root. and sometimes it doesn t stick because you are resisted.. Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
ygData.messageBody:
Anytime a mob is hit (maybe just by magic) it has chance to break root. and
sometimes it doesn't stick because you are resisted..

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 10:19 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] On a note of mistakes...


> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>
> Hail
>
> Well I think I'm actually gonna keep my guy with the Quellious god.
Thanks
> for the info about wisdom.
>
> I have a question though. I was on kerra (wisp) isle fighting wisps and I
> was the 'rooter'. The first few, I would root and a few seconds later
they
> would be moving. Then after those first few, when I rooted, it sticked
and
> they never moved the whole time.
>
> I've seen the root spell also not work when I'm trying to get a gnoll that
> is running away in BB but most of the time it does.
>
> Does root have a random duration or something or sometimes doesn't take
> affect?
> Has anyone else have these troubles?
>
> Azboklin the enchanter (lv10 just yesterday)
>
